example.text: Our immigration system needs reform, yet the proposed solution by MAGA Republicans is to vilify immigrants and rack up $6.1 billion in the process. This isn't fixing the problem; it's amplifying it. [[url]]

In October 2019, the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure passed my bill to allow States to issue NPDES permits with terms up to 10 years as part of then-Chairman DeFazio's bipartisan ``Water Quality Protection and Job Creation Act of 2019'' (HR 1497). Mr. Speaker, I encourage all Members to cosponsor this bipartisan bill.

Am I required to have health insurance? In California, most people are required by law to have health insurance or pay a tax penalty of $850/adult + $425/child under 18, up to $2,550/household, or 2.5% of your annual household income over your California tax filing threshold, whichever is highest .
